ygData.msgSnippet: Galvatron s glow flashed. Sudenly he disapperaed. So did Apocalypse and Death. All the was was a dark hole seeping down to the earths core. It had been sealed

 Galvatron's glow flashed. Sudenly he disapperaed. So did Apocalypse and 
Death. All the was was a dark hole seeping down to the earths core. It had 
been sealed off to keep from any interuptions. So no visible hole could be 
seen. The joining had begun......a cacoon had been formed.
